discussion.p: The resolution of did not resolve similar necessary changes for algorithm remove_copy[_if], which seems to be an oversight.

resolution.p: In /p.6, replace the N2461 requires clause with:
resolution.blockquote: Requires: Type T is EqualityComparable (31). The ranges [first,last) and [result,result + (last - first)) shall not overlap. The expression *result = *first shall be valid.
